# load packages

```{r libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(janitor)
library(ggeasy)

# adjust year/week values here
year = 2025
week = 20
```

# get the data

```{r get}

tt <- tt_load(year, week)

df <- tt[[1]]

glimpse(df)

```
